articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: Coronavirus: Is COVID airborne or not? Here's what you need to know - Times of India
articles.description: The novel coronavirus is a respiratory illness, which is highly infectious and fatal. While people continue to take precautionary measures and maintain social distancing, the discussion around whether or not COVID-19 is airborne seems to rage on.
articles.content: Up until today, COVID-19 has not been confirmed as an airborne disease. However, many scientists in the past have suggested the possibility of airborne transmission of the virus. While WHO has confir… [+720 chars]
